mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HNYC_HEAD_INFO (msg_id, ws_mark, ws_method, ws_param, curr_time, curr_user, rece_info) VALUES ( #{msg_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ws_mark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ws_method, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ws_param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curr_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{curr_user, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rece_info, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HNYC_HEAD_INFO SET ws_mark = #{ws_mark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ws_method = #{ws_method, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ws_param = #{ws_param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, curr_time = #{curr_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, curr_user = #{curr_user, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rece_info = #{rece_info, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE msg_id = #{msg_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
